entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Occasional drifting snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023
